name: @cultural-archiver/mass-import
description: Mass import library for Cultural Archiver - automated ingestion of public art data

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist/importers')) fs.mkdirSync('dist/importers', {recursive: true}); const importersDir = path.join('importers'); const distImportersDir = path.join('dist', 'importers'); fs.readdirSync(importersDir).filter(f => f.endsWith('.json')).forEach(f => { fs.copyFileSync(path.join(importersDir, f), path.join(distImportersDir, f)); });"

author: Steven Smethurst
